issue.title: Test issue for Clide webhook analysis
issue.body:
Hi Clide! ðŸ‘‹

This is a test issue to demonstrate your webhook analysis capabilities.

## Problem
I want to test how you analyze GitHub issues and provide recommendations.

## Expected Behavior
Clide should analyze this issue and provide:
- Priority assessment
- Category classification
- Suggested labels
- Recommended actions

## Additional Context
This is part of testing the HLS webhook handler with real GitHub integration.

Please analyze this issue! ðŸ¤–
